title: Verizon moves all installment plans to three years, dropping 24 and 30-month options
content:
Not too long ago, carriers in the United States tied device purchases to service contracts, locking many people into using a phone or a network they might not have wanted to use. The post Verizon moves all installment plans to three years, dropping 24 and 30-month options appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Verizon has stopped offering 24-month and 30-month installment plans, only leaving the 36-month financing option left.
